channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: River Rescue; INC#0750; 08:57AM; 14240 W Paxton St; MAP: https://maps.app.goo.gl/kJBSDvR2Et3EpYfK9; #Arleta; Firefighters are responding to reports of the need for a river rescue of a 6-year-old male. Crews are staged at various rescue points along the waterway to attempt a rescue, and are searching by ground and air.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC2 BC5 BC712 CM20 CM22 E102 E227 E239 E260 E39 E55 E60 E7 E86 E97 EM5 FR91 H1 H4 H5 HA1 HA4 HA5 RA7 RA78 RA878 SC1 SW44 SW88 SW89 T27 T39 T60 UR27 UR3; CH5; 12; Nicholas Prange

Debris Flow; INC#0696; 08:31AM; 1919 N Beverly Dr; #BeverlyCrest; A debris flow has caused significant damage to approximately 5 homes. Thankfully, no one was trapped. Dept of Building and Safety has been notified to assess and red tag any seriously compromised structures. Firefighters assisted residents with evacuation. Approximately 10 people have been displaced.; FS 108; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC14 BC712 BC9 CM40 CM42 E108 E288 E289 E292 EM14 HR3 RA71 RA88 RA889 T88 T89 T92 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Debris Flow; INC#0016; 01:50AM; 18046 W Boris Dr; #Tarzana; Three homes were impacted by a small debris flow. Only one had residents home at the time. Both residents were evacuated, with assistance from LAFD Firefighters. No reported injuries.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC17 DT1 E273 E83 E93 LD2 LD4 PI3 T73 TP1; CH8; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0028; 01:22AM; 2056 W 97th St; #GramercyPark; Firefighters battled a stubborn fire in a one-story home, which started with heavy fire in the attic, and eventually spread throughout the home, before firefighters eliminated the flames. It took 42 firefighters 63 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC4 BC706 CM20 CM22 E264 E266 E295 E57 E64 E66 E95 EM13 RA257 RA57 RA857 T64 T66 T95; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Debris Flow; INC#0016; 12:12AM; 18046 W Boris Dr; #Tarzana; *At least* three homes have been impacted by a debris flow. Crews are assisting residents with evacuation.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC17 E273 E83 E93 LD2 LD4 T73 TP1; CH8; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0028; 12:19AM; 2056 W 97th St; #GramercyPark; Smoke showing from the attic of a one-story single-family home. Offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC706 E264 E266 E57 E64 E66 RA257 RA857 T64 T66; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Debris Flow; INC#1624; 11:25PM; 11960 W Lockridge Rd; MAP: https://maps.app.goo.gl/QTrL8PhTek8Du4v29; #StudioCity; Firefighters have assisted 16 residents to come down from Lockridge Rd after a debris flow caused significant damage to two homes. All nine homes on Lockridge Rd have been evacuated (including pets), and LAPD/EMD are working together to offer emergency shelter locations to residents (if needed). Department of Building and Safety is on scene evaluating the situation. DWP and Gas Company are assessing impacted utilities in the area. Thankfully, no one was injured and there are no medical needs.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 CM40 CM42 E278 E60 E97 EM14 HE1 PI3 RA861 RA878 RA97 T78; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1556; 09:05PM; 1914 E 97th St; MAP: https://maps.app.goo.gl/XL33rhDR5BrKwnk27; #Watts; It took 32 firefighters 22 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames, which originated in an outside vehicle, and spread to the attic of a nearby home. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC706 E21 E233 E264 E64 E65 RA65 RA865 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Debris Flow; INC#1624; 09:08PM; 11960 W Lockridge Rd; MAP: https://maps.app.goo.gl/XA4RYkVgrw8F5swB9; #StudioCity; Firefighters are on scene of a small debris flow that damaged at least two homes and flowed into the street. Firefighters are assisting residents from at least six homes with evacuation, in case further soil instability causes another flow nearby. LAFD Heavy Equipment is on scene to assist with soil/debris. Thankfully, no one was injured, however residents will be displaced. Red Cross has been notified to assist. PIO Captain Cody Weireter is en route, ETA 11:05pm.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 CM40 CM42 E278 E60 E97 HE1 RA878 RA97 T78; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1556; 08:43PM; 1914 E 97th St; MAP: https://maps.app.goo.gl/3iamLbqRbi29n6KC8; #Watts; Auto fire, which spread to the adjacent one-story home, causing an attic fire. Offensive mode.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC706 E21 E233 E264 E64 E65 RA65 RA865 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange
